thread.title: Man is blown off his feet as he battles Storm Doris winds | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Man is blown off his feet as he battles Storm Doris winds | Daily Mail Online

author: Mark Duell For Mailonline
title: Man is blown off his feet as he battles Storm Doris winds | Daily Mail Online
text: comments This is the moment a man was blown off his feet as he battled winds gusting at up to 94mph as Storm Doris hit Britain. The man was running along a street in Merseyside today when he appeared to be taken by the strong winds and fell onto the pavement on his back. Video footage also showed another man helping a woman to walk after she had been holding onto a hand rail in a desperate attempt to stay on her feet. The man was running along a street in Merseyside today as Storm Doris hit with high winds Meanwhile two men were also seen helping an elderly woman along the same stretch of pavement as the country was hit by the violent weather conditions. In the same area, Peel Ports in Liverpool announced the city's port had been closed due to '100mph gusts of wind'. RELATED ARTICLES
